Disclaimer

Please read this disclaimer carefully before using our services

For Entertainment & Self-Reflection Only

All content, tools, and readings provided on Korean Saju Guide are intended solely for entertainment, cultural education, and personal reflection purposes. They should not be used as the basis for making any important life decisions.

Nature of Saju

Saju (Korean Four Pillars) is a traditional cultural practice with deep historical roots in Korean and East Asian philosophy. It is a system of interpretation based on cosmological principles and should be understood as a cultural tradition—not as a scientifically validated method of prediction or analysis.

We present Saju content as a way to explore Korean cultural heritage and as a tool for personal reflection. We do not claim that Saju can accurately predict the future or definitively determine personality traits.

Not Professional Advice

The content on this website is NOT and should NOT be considered as:

  • Medical Advice: Do not use Saju readings to diagnose, treat, or prevent any health conditions. Always consult qualified healthcare professionals for medical concerns.
  • Psychological Advice: Saju readings are not a substitute for professional mental health services. If you're experiencing psychological distress, please seek help from a licensed therapist or counselor.
  • Legal Advice: Do not make legal decisions based on Saju content. Consult a qualified attorney for legal matters.
  • Financial Advice: Do not make investment or financial decisions based on Saju readings. Consult qualified financial advisors for money matters.
  • Relationship Counseling: Our compatibility tool is for entertainment only. For relationship issues, seek guidance from qualified relationship counselors.

No Guarantees of Accuracy

We make no representations or warranties about the accuracy, reliability, completeness, or timeliness of any content on this Website. Our Saju calculations are based on traditional methods but may differ from other interpretations or practitioners.

Responsible Use

We encourage you to approach Saju with an open but critical mind. Use it as:

  • A cultural learning experience
  • A starting point for self-reflection
  • An interesting way to explore personality concepts
  • A fun activity to share with friends and family

Do NOT use it as:

  • A definitive guide to your life path
  • A basis for major life decisions
  • A replacement for professional advice
  • Evidence of predetermined destiny

Beware of Scams

Unfortunately, some unethical practitioners may use Saju or similar practices to exploit vulnerable people. Be wary of anyone who:

  • Claims to know your exact future
  • Pressures you to pay for "curse removal" or "luck enhancement"
  • Uses fear-based language to encourage payment
  • Makes absolute predictions about health, relationships, or finances

Our tools are free to use, and we will never ask for payment to "fix" or "improve" your Saju.

Cultural Sensitivity

We approach Saju with respect for its Korean cultural origins. While we aim to make this tradition accessible to international audiences, we acknowledge that our presentation may not capture all nuances understood by traditional practitioners.

Your Responsibility

By using this Website, you acknowledge that:

  • You understand the entertainment nature of our content
  • You will not rely on Saju readings for important decisions
  • You take full responsibility for how you use this information
  • You will seek professional help for serious life matters

Contact

If you have any questions about this disclaimer, please contact us.

⚠️ Entertainment & Self-Reflection Only: The information provided on this site is for cultural education and entertainment purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical, legal, psychological, or financial advice.
